import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import Axios from 'axios' import '../../style/default.scss' import { Card, Form, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import '../../style/member/member_content.scss' import { MdVisibility, MdDone } from 'react-icons/md' import { withRouter, Link } from 'react-router-dom' function MemberContent(props) { const [member_name, setMembername] = useState('') const [member_account, setMemberaccount] = useState('') const [member, setMember] = useState([]) const [newaccount, setNewMemberaccount] = useState('') const [gender, setGender] = useState('男') useEffect(() => { Axios.get(`http://localhost:3001/member/get/${props.match.params.id}`).then( (res) => { setMember(res.data) } ) }) const UpdateReview = () => { Axios.put('http://localhost:3001/member/update', { member_name: member_name, member_account: newaccount, }) setNewMemberaccount('') } const handleGenderChange = (event) => { const value = event.target.value setGender(value) } return ( <> {member.map((val) => { return (
